channel.title: The Mark Kaye Show
channel.description: Every weekday from 12pm-3pm, Mark Kaye talks about the big local news of the day, the latest out of Washington and what it means to you! He also takes calls with his listeners to discuss their thoughts and opinions.
channel.itunes:author: Cox Media Group
channel.itunes:summary: Every weekday from 12pm-3pm, Mark Kaye talks about the big local news of the day, the latest out of Washington and what it means to you! He also takes calls with his listeners to discuss their thoughts and opinions.

item.title: Let The Sunshine
item.description: 3-7-2018 Florida Senate votes 33-2 for the "Sunshine Protection Act." Now, Governor Scott will take it to the U.S. Congress to decide if Florida will get a year-round daylight savings time. Mark wants to hear Jacksonville's reaction.

item.title: DICK'S changes it's policy on gun sales.
